newsitems.title: Dead Space's Isaac Clarke Comes to Life as This Amazing Custom Action Figure

Remember the Dead Space hero as he should be remembered, with this intricately-detailed, custom-made action figure. newsitems.title: Dead Space's Navigation System is Now a Reality
newsitems.contents: If Dead Space is to be remembered for one thing, it should be its navigation system, where pressing a button triggers an illuminated "path" in the game world showing you your destination. I don't know if it was the first game to do this, but it was certainly the first to do it so prominently/so well...

newsitems.title: The BioShock, Dead Space  InFamous Art of Opus Artz
newsitems.contents: Opus Artz is a concept studio in London which specialises in production art for the video game industry.
